name: CXC Ultimate YouTube Sim.
description:
NOTE: This Game has continuous In-Game updates for More Content to be released!  DO NOT DELETE if this game has more to offer!  There is so much to play! (Even if you get the End Credits, that does not mean the game is over!)

Internet Access required!This game is Made by RPG Maker MV, and uses its Own Browser to run.  

PLEASE READ LAST TWO PARAGRAPHS FOR UPDATE NOTES THAT ARE IMPORTANT!!!

Please do support our work by donating Money to fund us!  Doing this by playing, buying, downloading, (Even donating) can help us make more games in the future! Thank You! -ConnorXcrash (YouTube Gamer: #PixelCXC)

Your YouTube Career is now inside the Game you play!  WIth a continuous Update of challenges, games, features, and to be unleashed, the #PixelCXC Ultimate YouTube®™ SImulator is now a NEW Role-Playing,  PIxel-Fun, and an extraordinary new adventure to take place in this fun-packed, action-filled, WIld game!  As you go inside the Game you record, you can now break the boundaries that were in your path before, and seek out to fulfill your Destiny to be a YouTuber!  

There's only two words left to say to finish this entire paragraph and bundle of sentences that are extremely long and exhausting to say because of the Campaign that awaits in the game soon, and more games that are to be added, this Game is no ordinary game, so what are you waiting for, can I stop typing now and have my break to return on my Channel and finish the game before its Campaign comes ou--  Oh! Okay...GAME ON

Campaign Background Story:  Welcome to YouTube!  Where you can Upload to the World who you really are!  But...you don't.  ConnorXcrash (#PixelCXC)  is hiding something from you, and he doesn't want you to know!  But the Simulator has a Glitch!  The real CXC is either outside, or inside the TubeSimulator!  You are the only one to save him, and his YouTuber friends, and it's up to you to stop the Man in The Hat, and join forces to save CyberSpace, and the entire planet!!  You are the only hope of this world, and this community!  But, you need to be on your way right now!  So yeah, get out of here.

Update Notes are now on Devlog posts!

OUTSIDE IN-GAME CONTENT IS ALL OWNED BY PC STUDIOS (Ex. Your Room, and other Maps)
